ERR_NO_MESSAGE: There is no note message - You can't JUST have buttons, you need a message to go with it!
ERR_NO_ANSWER: You didn't specify what to reply with!
HANDLER_REMOVED: Yep, I'll stop replying to that.
ERR_NOT_A_FILTER: That's not a current filter - run /filters for all active filters.
ERR_BAD_URL: You seem to be trying to use an unsupported url protocol. Telegram doesn't support buttons for some protocols, such as tg://. Please try again, or ask in @MarieSupport for help.
ERR_NO_REPLY: his note could not be sent, as it is incorrectly formatted. Ask in @MarieSupport if you can't figure out why!
ERR_COULDNT_PARSE_FILTER: Could not parse filter %s in chat %s
HELP:
- /filters: list all active filters in this chat.

*Admin only:*
 - /filter <keyword> <reply message>: add a filter to this chat. The bot will now reply that message whenever 'keyword' is mentioned. If you reply to a sticker with a keyword, the bot will reply with that sticker. NOTE: all filter keywords are in lowercase. If you want your keyword to be a sentence, use quotes. eg: /filter "hey there" How you doin?
 - /stop <filter keyword>: stop that filter.
